item.title: PHYS105-lab-20200326
item.description: Centripetal force lab # The string holds the bob, and the entire mechanism spins in a circle to cause the bob to extend outward and hit the tape marker. Time for 20 revolutions Data measured is from inside to center of L Should be percent difference not % error Write a brief conclusion after the lab. Usually we try to make our experiments have a small percent error, but until now its been hard to tell if it is indeed small.
